extendedInfo.description: Free and simple tool to set DNS settings on the fly.IMPORTANT: REQUIRES SUPERUSER (ROOTED PHONES)Press [MENU] to configure automation so the selected DNS settings will stick throughout connectivity changes.Select to only automate on 3G or WIFI connections.DNS list updates on startup, if internet connectivity is available.Note that some Internet Service Providers restrict access to certain resources via DNS requests. If unable to access said resources, please try turning off automation and reconnecting to 3G first.IMPORTANT: REQUIRES SUPERUSER (ROOTED PHONES)Internet access permission is required to download the latest list of DNS providers for quick selection via the dropdown list.

reviews.title: Great, simple app.
reviews.comment: Hi Eddy, great app. Noticed it requests super user quite frequently on my nexus 4 after a reboot, its not much of a problem but obviously if its requesting frequently its probably reapplying the DNS when it doesn\'t need to.
reviews.author: Martin Kemp

reviews.title: Sweet little DNS app.
reviews.comment: This freed me from my carrier\'s inane automagical error page DNS.  Works perfectly on both my Nexus 4 and 7.
reviews.author: Patrick Audley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thank you so much this app just works!!
reviews.author: phoenix stutz

reviews.title: It just works!
reviews.comment: All I need is an app to set OpenDNS for me. That\'s what this one does. Always and without any problems.
reviews.author: Christian Dysthe

reviews.title: Perfect and free!
reviews.comment: Works great, resolved issues with DNS on my G2X perfectly, has plenty of DNS options (Level3 ftw). Only con is it doesn\'t turn my phone into an HTC One X ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If it has no effect, e.g., because root is denied, it still claims success. Apart from that, fine!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WOW!
reviews.comment: A fantastic app in a very lightweight package. I switched to Google\'s DNS server and my internet speed is ridiculously fast compared to before. Small and simply to use. Highly recommended for all rooted handsets!
reviews.author: Bryan Fitzpatrick

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: No coment....just..Awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works great under 4.2.2
reviews.comment: but now with android 4.3 update, it wont work anymore.
reviews.author: Adi Chandra

reviews.title: Mantap..
reviews.comment: Perfect.. recommended..must have..
reviews.author: Henry Kristanto

reviews.title: Does not auto apply
reviews.comment: It used to work fine in my old phone. This time it dues but apply automatically upon enabling mobile data. Any fix? I\'d hate to go back to the app to apply dns every time. Ps: I have tried all the settings
reviews.author: Nithin Suresh

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Helped me use my DNS to gain access to us Netflix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t use custom dns
reviews.comment: Tried several times to enter in a custom dns but the app would simply not let edit what was in the box.  If I backspace, it jumps to the beginning.  If I try to just type, it won\'t overwrite what\'s in there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BingO
reviews.comment: This app is far the best DNS Static Changer on the market.Permissions are spot on for the app as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why after i changing the DNS i cant download or upload the image, i cant open my gallery too! Please help!!
reviews.author: Iqbal Hazen

reviews.title: Great job
reviews.comment: DNS now set everytime when switching between Wifi and network.
reviews.author: Daveon Dacosta

reviews.title: Just works
reviews.comment: It just works, the Norton DNS options are helpful too for setting up malware filter
reviews.author: Martheen Cahya Paulo

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: Changes the DNS settings exactly like it\'s supposed to do. On my Verizon Droid Pro, MMS won\'t work if this app changes the DNS settings automatically for 3G. I just use it for WIFI.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on 3g on 4.3
reviews.comment: Used to work great but now it only works on Wi-Fi
reviews.author: Drew Withers

reviews.title: F/C
reviews.comment: Everytime force close and lags
